headline: Tickets for world events. In Czech, clearly, in a few clicks.
intro: With AJSEE®, you no longer have to search and buy tickets on foreign websites...
feature1-desc: Your tickets are always verified and original.
feature2-desc: We communicate in Czech and handle everything for you.
feature3-desc: Only the best events and partners.
partners-cta: I want to become a partner
contact-success-msg: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.
about-short: We believe culture brings people together. We bring you world-class events without language barriers and with true passion!
about-hero-text:
My name is Adam Brázda and I am the founder of AJSEE®. From an early age, I have been fascinated by the world of culture, music and travel. I believe everyone has the right to experience any concert, show or sports event—wherever it takes place—without unnecessary barriers.

The idea for AJSEE® was born out of a simple wish: to help people from the Czech Republic and Slovakia travel for experiences without being limited by a foreign website, complicated orders, or ticket uncertainties. I want it to be easy to access world events—clearly, safely, and with a personal touch.

We don’t want to be just another ticketing portal. With AJSEE®, we offer broad language support, customer-first service, and a passion for culture that I share with my team and with you.

I believe experiences have no boundaries. AJSEE® is here to make your journey to them easy, joyful, and inspiring.

Culture belongs to everyone. AJSEE® is here for you.
about-value-1: Openness – We make world experiences accessible to all.
about-value-3: Innovation – We follow trends, curate the best events and technologies.
event-demo-badge: Sample events – real ticket sales coming soon. Stay tuned!
events-hero-desc: Discover concerts, festivals, theatre and sports in one clear catalogue.
